name: Get Youtube Subs
author: M. Zohaib

sections.description:
Add Youtube Subscriber widget in WordPress post and pages, Shows Subscribe button for youtube channel, Fetch Youtube Subscribers, and channel icon. Please paste ID-Based URL in the widget area.

Features

  • customizable (change layout, change subscribers count visibility)
  • Show youtube channel subcribers
  • Youtube Subscribe button
  • Display Channel Icon
  • Add Shortcode Anywhere
sections.installation:
1. Unpack the download package
  2. Upload all files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, include folders
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to Widget area, where you can change what settings you need.
sections.faq:
1. Where I can find the plugin?
    • WordPress Widget area
    1. How to get Channel ID: [https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/6180214?hl=en]
    2. How to add Shortcode?
    • [gtys channel=’paste-channel-name-here’ layout=’default or full’ subs_count=’default or hidden’]
sections.changelog:
v1.0 (02/12/2020)

  • completely new code
  • Widget area

v2.0 (10/09/2021)

  • Missing Stylesheet and Scriptfile issues resolved
  • Shortcode feature Added

v3.0 (14/12/2021)

  • Extends Shortcode feature with layout and subscribers visibility
  • Subcribers count visibility added For widget area
  • Widget can be added using elementor now

v3.5 (13/05/2023)

  • compatibility checks for wordpress 6.2
